# The `Reduction` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Represent a sequence of multiply-accumulate operations with the aim to perform the multiplications in parallel. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class anonymous_namespace{ARMParallelDSP.cpp}::Reduction</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Represent a sequence of multiply-accumulate operations with the aim to perform the multiplications in parallel.

Definition at line 85 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armparalleldsp-cpp">ARMParallelDSP.cpp</a>.

### InsertAcc() {#ae339cfdd04f4c821c4757a725d4745bf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;ARMParallelDSP.cpp&#125;::Reduction::InsertAcc (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Add the incoming accumulator value, returns true if a value had not already been added.

Returning false signals to the user that this reduction already has a value to initialise the accumulator.
